abstract: Union members are set to cast two votes that will determine whether they accept a new contract or strike at a crucial moment in the development of Boeing’s newest plane, the Dreamliner.
snippet: Union members are set to cast two votes that will determine whether they accept a new contract or strike at a crucial moment in the development of Boeing’s newest plane, the Dreamliner.
lead_paragraph: Members of the machinists’ union at the Boeing Company are set to cast two votes on Wednesday that will determine whether they accept a new contract or strike the aircraft maker at a crucial moment in the development of its newest plane, the Dreamliner.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: International Assn of Machinists and Aerospace Workers
